text: Tini akasa hate brstipata karena, phale upatyakasamuha tadera parimana anuyayi plabita haya ebam plabana tara uparera abarjana bahana kare. Erupe abarjana uparibhage ase yakhana alankara ba taijasapatra nirmanera uddesye kichu agune uttapta kara haya [1]. Ebhabe allahâ€Œ satya o asatyera drstanta diye thakena. Ya abarjana ta phele deya haya ebam ya manusera upakare ase ta jamite theke yaya. Ebhabe allah upama diye thakena
